Frequently Asked Questions

What types of projects do you work on?

We specialize in enterprise web applications, SaaS platforms, company intranets, and custom business solutions. Our expertise includes full-stack development, API integrations, and deployment automation.

Do you work with existing systems?

Yes! We excel at system integration and can work with your existing infrastructure. We can modernize legacy systems, create APIs for integration, and build solutions that complement your current technology stack.

What's your typical project timeline?

Project timelines vary based on complexity and requirements. Simple integrations can be completed in 1-2 weeks, while comprehensive enterprise solutions may take 3-6 months. We provide detailed timelines during our initial consultation.

Do you provide ongoing support?

Absolutely! We offer various support packages including bug fixes, feature updates, security patches, and general maintenance. Our goal is to ensure your solution continues to serve your business effectively.

Can you help with deployment and hosting?

Yes, we provide complete deployment solutions including Docker containerization, VPS setup, CI/CD pipelines, SSL configuration, and monitoring. We can deploy to your preferred hosting environment or recommend the best options.

Do you work internationally?

We work with clients worldwide and are experienced in remote collaboration. We use modern communication tools and project management practices to ensure smooth coordination across time zones.

How We Can Help

Startup MVPs

Rapid prototype development to validate your business ideas and get to market quickly.

Enterprise Solutions

Scalable applications designed to handle enterprise-level complexity and user loads.

System Modernization

Upgrade legacy systems with modern technologies while maintaining business continuity.

Mobile-First Design

Responsive web applications that provide excellent user experience on all devices.

Cloud Migration

Move your applications to the cloud with optimized performance and cost efficiency.

Team Training

Upskill your development team with modern frameworks, best practices, and methodologies.

Privacy Policy

×

Information We Collect

We collect information you provide directly to us, such as when you fill out our contact form, subscribe to our newsletter, or communicate with us via email.

How We Use Your Information

  • To respond to your inquiries and provide customer support
  • To send you technical updates and newsletters (if subscribed)
  • To improve our services and website functionality
  • To comply with legal obligations

Information Sharing

We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personal information to third parties without your consent, except as described in this policy or as required by law.

Data Security

We implement appropriate security measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction.

Contact Us

If you have questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at tiatheone@protonmail.com.
